description: Rice noodles tossed with tamarind sauce, tofu, and crisp vegetables, plated alongside a fresh cucumber-lime ribbon salad.

imagePrompt.base: Vibrant close-up of Veggie Pad Thai, plated to showcase vivid textures and color. Incorporate visual cues from this description: Rice noodles tossed with tamarind sauce, tofu, and crisp vegetables, plated alongside a fresh cucumber-lime ribbon salad.. Scene: thai-inspired table with soft natural daylight, eye-level perspective, and shallow depth of field. Capture fresh garnish, gentle steam, and a sense of homemade comfort. No people or branded props.
imagePrompt.enhanced: An intimate, slightly elevated close-up of Veggie Pad Thai, artfully mounded with glistening rice noodles, perfectly golden tofu, and a vibrant medley of crisp vegetables. A fresh cucumber-lime ribbon salad elegantly cascades alongside. Bathed in a warm, diffused natural glow, highlighting delicate steam and fresh cilantro, crushed peanuts, and a lime wedge. Shallow depth of field evokes inviting homemade comfort.
